Package pizza

Class CustomPizza

java.lang.Object
pizza.Pizza
pizza.CustomPizza
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuItem, Bases, Cheeses, Sauces
public class CustomPizza extends Pizza implements MenuItem
Custom Pizza allows the addition of extra toppings for a more delicious Pizza.

Unless you're a margarita fan :)

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomPizza

      public CustomPizza() throws TooManyToppingsException
      Default constructor which creates a medium cheese pizza.

      A medium cheese pizza has a tomato sauce base, mozzarella cheese and no additional toppings.

      This pizza should be called "Custom Pizza" until another name is set.

      Throws:
      TooManyToppingsException - when attempting to add toppings to Pizza or any class extending Pizza

    • CustomPizza

      public CustomPizza(Bases.BaseSize size, Sauces.Sauce sauce, Cheeses.Cheese cheese) throws TooManyToppingsException
      Creating the default requirements of a pizza with no additional toppings.

      This pizza should be called "Custom Pizza" until another name is set.

      Parameters:
      size - The size of the pizza base as defined by Bases
      sauce - The sauce on the pizza as defined by Sauces
      cheese - The cheese on the pizza as defined by Cheeses
      Throws:
      TooManyToppingsException - when attempting to add toppings to Pizza or any class extending Pizza

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(List<Topping> toppings) throws TooManyToppingsException
      The add method allows toppings to be added to the pizza, limited to the maximum permissible amount of 5.

      This method will only add toppings to the pizza if ALL given toppings can be added. If an exception is thrown then the list of toppings should remain unchanged.

      Parameters:
      toppings - list of toppings to be added to the pizza
      Throws:
      TooManyToppingsException - if adding the new toppings causes the number of toppings to exceed the limit of 5
      TooManyToppingsException - when attempting to add toppings to Pizza or any class extending Pizza

    • add

      public void add(Topping topping) throws TooManyToppingsException
      The add method allows a single topping to be added to the pizza, limited to the maximum permissible amount of 5.
      Parameters:
      topping - topping to be added to the pizza
      Throws:
      TooManyToppingsException - if adding the new topping causes the number of toppings to exceed the limit of 5

    • remove

      public void remove(Topping topping)
      The remove method removes the first occurrence of the specified topping from this pizza, if it is present.

      If the topping is not on the pizza, it is unchanged.

      Parameters:
      topping - topping to be removed from the pizza
